Description:
Job Requisition ID #Position OverviewThe Renewals Specialist for Territory is responsible for driving, forecasting, and closing renewals opportunities within the Territory region. This role primarily works to drive renewals closure in-directly through close partner engagement and day to day monitoring and management. This role will also engage customers directly to drive the renewals opportunity to closure when needed.ResponsibilitiesAchieve assigned sales quotas

Opportunity Pipelines and Forecast Management for Territory accounts

May drive partner forecasting for territory business in some regions

Provide deal-specific primary and secondary sales support, i.e., deal creation, development, presentation, negotiation and closure

Serves as an escalation point for all renewal issues that impact the customer's retention, and it is responsible to drive risk mitigation execution

Identifies customer upsell and expansion opportunities

Sales results reporting and analysis by customer segment, region, sales channel, and product

Coordinate and execute collaborative channel partner, Territory sales and customer sales meetings to increase renewals performanceMinimum QualificationsComplexity: works to resolve complex issues and can exercise sound

judgement in solution

Negotiation: Undertake complex negotiations with customer and

partners

Influencing: Able to influence partners in driving the right renewals outcome

Preferred Experience and Skills

4+ years sales/renewals experience

Proven ability to negotiate $10k+ complex sales/renewals deals

Working knowledge of SFDC#LI-SV2Learn MoreAbout Autodesk

Offers are based on the candidate’s experience and geographic location. In addition to base salaries, we also have a significant emphasis on discretionary annual cash bonuses, commissions for sales roles, stock or long-term incentive cash grants, and a comprehensive benefits package.Diversity & Belonging
